languages.text: "Отрекшиеся от Него при жизни не достойны Его милости в посмертии".
"Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."
languages.original_text: "Отрекшиеся от Него при жизни не достойны Его милости в посмертии".

traits.locale_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

languages.text: “生前否认帝皇的人，死后不配得到祂的怜悯。”
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: “生前否认帝皇的人，死后不配得到祂的怜悯。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ceux qui Le renient de leur vivant ne peuvent espérer bénéficier de Sa miséricorde dans la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui Le renient de leur vivant ne peuvent espérer bénéficier de Sa miséricorde dans la mort. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Quienes niegan al Emperador en vida no merecen su compasión en la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: «Quienes niegan al Emperador en vida no merecen su compasión en la muerte».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「生きて皇帝を否定する者に、死に際して与えられる慈悲などない」
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: 「生きて皇帝を否定する者に、死に際して与えられる慈悲などない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wer ihm im Leben nicht huldigt, hat seine Gnade im Tod nicht verdient."
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: "Wer ihm im Leben nicht huldigt, hat seine Gnade im Tod nicht verdient."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

languages.text: "Sağken O'nu inkâr edenler, ölümde O'nun merhametine layık olamaz."
languages.original_text: "Those who deny Him in life are not worthy of His mercy in death."

traits.locale_text: "Sağken O'nu inkâr edenler, ölümde O'nun merhametine layık olamaz."
